basics.label: Architect, Developer, Technologist
basics.summary: Enthusiastic, flexible, innovative and confident of my skills and abilities I pride myself on my energy and drive.  Maximising and channelling these qualities, I take full advantage of both the active search for a solution in concert with the fulfilment and learning opportunity that comes from a satisfactory outcome. A problem solver, confident manager and patient mentor, I am at ease performing a lead role in any given situation and/or task. Aspiring to achieve an ever increasing level of expertise in my chosen field I work hard to stay at the forefront of emerging technologies, methodologies and practices that drive the industry.

work.summary:
Day to day Staff Management of the IT department (Networks and Support, 2 technicians and Software Development, 4 developers).
Create and champion the Disaster Recovery team with a view to the research, provision and maintenance of a long term strategy for Business Contingency Planning and emergency re-location of the (in house) call centre and it’s crucial operational systems.
Provide technology support to other departments within the business’ as directed by the Managing Director, including advice on new products and solutions, specifically to identify System Integration or hardware/software Procurement and Licensing requirements.
Responsible for the supervision and efficient delivery of external (third party) projects which involve IT and operational systems.
Drive the business system design changes (Database Architecture Design and Business Logic Modelling) necessary to facilitate the progress of future business opportunities with a large global vendor.
highlights: Instrumental in the process changes required for the setup, Staff Recruitment and day-to-day Project Management (using an Agile Development model, SCRUM) of an Offshore Agile Development Team (located in Manila, Philippines) including Cost Analysis, inter office communication solution analysis and Software Quality Assurance goals and commitments.

Key member of the Executive Management Group (EMG), steering Corporate Strategy and IT Governance discussions. Manage policies and procedures required to ensure the efficient use of technology, technical staff and assets to achieve and support the business’ short and long term goals in line with strategic vision.
